title: The Peter Diamond Mystery Collection
description:
Audio Books : Mystery and Suspense : Other quality : English

All are unabridged and most are recorded at 32kbps / 22kHz Mono CBR except for books 1,8,10,11,12 and 13 which are 48kbps / 44kHz.

Most are CD quality except books 3, 4 and 5 which were only available from cassette tapes.



Note that three of these recordings are from cassette tapes that are in some cases quite old (especially #4 Bloodhounds), and thus while the sound quality may be a tad dull and variable, they are reasonably hiss free and clear.

This well written modern British mystery/crime series based in Bath is highly recommended.


#1. The Last Detective [1991], CD, 11 hours 28 mins, read by Simon Prebble (thanks to Jokedola for this rare audio book)


#2. Diamond Solitaire [1992], CD, 10 hours 46 mins, read by Simon Prebble


#3. The Summons [1995], Cassette, 12 hours 24 mins, read by Christopher Kay (thanks to ADM for this rare audio book)


#4. Bloodhounds [1996] , Cassette, 12 hours 19 mins, read by Christopher Kay (thanks to Norfolk for this rare audio book)


#5. Upon a Dark Night [1997], Cassette, 12 hours 57 mins, read by Christopher Kay


#6. The Vault [1999], CD, 11 hours 50 mins, read by Peter Barker


#7. Diamond Dust [2002], CD, 11 hours 30 mins, read by Steve Hodson


#8. The House Sitter [2003], CD, 12 hours 33 mins, read by Steve Hodson


#9. The Secret Hangman [2007], CD, 10 hours 25 mins, read by Christopher Scott


#10. Skeleton Hill [2009], CD, 12 hours 28 mins, read by Michael Tudor Barnes


#11. Stagestruck [2011], CD, 12 hours 48 mins, read by Steve Hodson


#12. Cop to Corpse [2012], ED, 11 hours 25 mins, read by Simon Prebble (thanks to Phyl)


#13. The Tooth Tattoo [2013], ED, 11 hours 40 mins, read by Clive Anderson (thanks to Phyl)


#14. The Stone Wife [2014], ED, 12 hours 13 mins, read by Michael Tudor Barnes (thanks to Phyl)



Enjoy and Seed!!
